title: Summoner Spells
body:
Hi RIOT ever since you killed Revive there has been 1 less spell that players could use. 
Evan though you have made that new 1 called Mark/Dash, which is only for Howling Abyss, 
there has still been no spell made for Summoners Rift use.
Evan though Revive was hardly used, it was still an option. So can you please make a new spell 
that can be used in Summoners Rift. 
Cheers, belibez.

replies.body: Wait no revive lol didn't even realise coz no one used that shitty summoner spell perhaps they could make 1 where u r temporarily invisible or in targetable for a period of time for a quick escape
That's like a buffed version of Zhonya's. {{item:3157}} But then again, it'll give you an early game advantage.
How about a summoner spell that temporarily increases attack damage or ability power?

There used to be one called Surge, which increased attack speed by 35% and ability power by 10-78 (based on level) for a few seconds. It was considered underpowered so I wouldn't expect Riot to make another Summoner Spell like it.
